"The picture isn't pretty," agrees the great Tory philosopher, Phillip Blond . With family breakdown for many, the fundamental bedrock of civic life in Britain has been destroyed. It was some of the very people who thought themselves left wing- the pleasure-seeking, mind-altering drug takers and sexual pioneers of the 1960s who instigated the fragmentation of the working-class family and sold the poor the poisonous idea of liberation through chemical and sexual experimentation.
